attributes.action: Petition for premises in Southwark/Lambeth for The Sunday Essiett Company to be able to support our youth
attributes.additional_details:
The Sunday Essiett Company is a grass root organisation who mentor and support the most disadvantaged in our community.

 We are not asking for funding to continue to meet the needs of our young people, the only obstacle we are faced with is finding a secure location from which we can work from.

After many, many attempts to secure premises on our own and with the help of Southwark councilors and members of the community we are asking government to help find us somewhere.

More info can be found on our website:

www.thesundayessiettcompany.com
www.supportingouryouth.com
